messages.subject: Japanese Shinsengumi Newsletter?
messages.msgSnippet: If anyone understands how this page works please let me know I would like to sign up for the newsletter but I can t figure out how
messages.messageBody:
If anyone understands how this page works please let me know I would
like to sign up for the newsletter but I can't figure out how
http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com/mm/
if anyone finds other newsletters in Japanese please contact me...I am
actually willing to sit there and read "translations" by nifty...it
seems that the symposium at Aizu has resulted in alot of information
secretarytocapt3 (a) hotmail.com
AIM badgerturtle
